document.full_text: the jury in the closely watched insider trading trial of hedge fund manager raj rajaratnam reheard on monday a dozen fbi phone taps centered on one transaction in the charges against the galleon group founder.
document.title: rajaratnam trial jury rehears fbi phone taps
lines_and_colors: the jury in the closely watched insider trading trial of hedge fund manager raj rajaratnam reheard on monday a dozen fbi phone taps centered on one transaction in the charges against the galleon group founder.
